content: "Whispers of the Moonlight"Act 1: In a moonlit garden, Luna sings of the night’s serenity. The spirit of night, Nocturnus, appears, enchanting the garden. He tempts Luna to remain in a world of dreams.Duet: "Stay Beneath the Moon"Nocturnus: "Time won’t touch you here."Luna: "But the sun I’ll never part."Act 2: Luna is drawn into a celestial ball. The Starry Queen and others beg her to stay in eternal revelry. Luna resists, choosing the day’s warmth as dawn breaks.Final Chorus: "The light awakens all."
